text: Ta zaoyu huannan zhihou, ruguo wo shi ta changshi cong wo jiangxia de enhui, ta biding shuo: Zhe shi wo yong gongzuo huan lai de. Wo bu xin fuhuo shi hui daolai. Ruguo wo bei zhao qu jian wo de zhu, ze wo zai ta nali bi shou zhi shan de baochou. Wo bi jiang bu xindao zhe de xingwei gaosu tamen, wo bi shi tamen changshi yanzhong de xingfa.
